structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.text: At the sittings of the supreme judicial court in Bristol county for which jurors are summoned to attend, one or more jurors from Nantucket county and at least four from Dukes county shall be summoned, the venires for which shall be issued by the clerk of the courts for Bristol county. The cost of their travel and attendance shall be paid by the counties from which they are summoned.
